name: bobcat-ignition-ota-updater
description: Automated OTA update script for Bobcat Ignition Controller

scripts.firmware-only: node -e "const OTA = require('./ota_update_script.js'); const ota = new OTA(); ota.initialize().then(() => ota.compileFirmware().then(() => ota.uploadFirmware().then(() => ota.cleanup())))"
scripts.filesystem-only: node -e "const OTA = require('./ota_update_script.js'); const ota = new OTA(); ota.initialize().then(() => ota.compileFilesystem().then(() => ota.uploadFilesystem().then(() => ota.cleanup())))"

author: lpgn
